title: Day 666
content:
# Day 666

![](https://miro.medium.com/0*8Yp2dtGtANDqR98I)

The Book of Revelation, specifically in Revelation 13:16â€“18 states:

> It also forced all people, great and small, rich and poor, free and slave, to receive a mark on their right hands or on their foreheads, so that they could not buy or sell unless they had the mark, which is the name of the beast or the number of its name.

> This calls for wisdom. Let the person who has insight calculate the number of the beast, for it is the number of a man. That number is 666.

Satan you are going to lose. Repent to the Alpha and Omega or continue to suffer. It is that simple.

People are waking up. The WEF is even being exposed and call out by Presidents. Seriously watch this video:

> [**Special address by Javier Milei, President of Argentina | Davos 2024 | World Economic Forum**](https://www.youtube.com/live/Pfcd0gWNIog)

Do not let darkness turn you into a coward. Speak up. Believe in a better future for our children, grandchildren, and great grandchildren. Be the force you want to see in this world.

Future looks bright.

As Elon Musk once said to the CEO of Disney; GFY Satan!

1/17/24

Conor Jay Chepenik
